content: Notable persons in the chief nation,
To whom the house of Israel comes!
Go over to Calneh and see;
And from there go to Hamath the great;
Then go down to Gath of the Philistines.
Or is their territory greater than your territory?
Then it shall come to pass, that if ten men remain in one house, they shall die.

And when a relative  with one who will burn  picks up the bodies to take them out of the house, he will say to one inside the house, “ any more with you?”Then someone will say, “None.”And he will say, “Hold your tongue! For we dare not mention the name of the .”
